Description: 1-Communicate with Purchasing Department Daily to track new PO and requests.2-Research and investigate any missing document.3-3 ways checking on the received items: PO, Invoice and physical items to make sure Price on the invoice match the PO, and Description and quantity are matched.4-Make sure a receiving form is accurately filled out with all the information.5-Obtain signature on the receiving form for the custodian.6-Efficiently complete the receiving, delivering and recording of new items in a timely manner.7-Review and check all the document to make sure all form are filled out properly.8-Follow up with Biomedical on all iters to obtain an acceptance form signed by Biomedical Director.9-Submit all documents to Property Control Director for review.10-Generate Report on all the receiving by PO, GRN, Supplier Name, Amount, Department and Date. And maintain accurate reports at all time in a soft copy file on the share drive.11-Communicates and provides Property Control Director with feedbacks.12-Make copies of GRN and distribute to Purchasing Department and Account Payable and obtain their signature. 13-File a copy of GRN in the receiving files.14-Assist in the Periodic Physical Inventory Count.15-Participate in other miscellaneous projects and tasks, as needed.Skills
Skills:
Reporting Skills, Attention to Detail, and Deadline-Oriented
proficiency in MS Word, MS Excel and MS Power Point
